title: Looking for duo :)
body:
Hi I'm currently in silver 2 and looking for a duo any role would be great but just so you know I lean towards playing mid or adc but if you are an adc main I am really good at support just don't prefer to play it with people in solo q I know sounds dumb but yeah. As with most people I don't like toxic players and I'm also open to constructive criticism. 
Thanks for reading
